concise_definition: n. (专有名词) 皮克林（姓氏/地名）

definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun referring to a surname, most notably associated with the Pickering family of astronomers in 19th- and 20th-century America, including Edward Charles Pickering and his team of female astronomers known as the 'Pickering's Harem'.
definitions.explanation_cn: 专有名词，指一个姓氏，最著名的是19至20世纪美国的皮克林家族天文学家，包括爱德华·查尔斯·皮克林及其团队——被称为‘皮克林的后宫’的女性天文学家。
definitions.example_en: Edward Charles Pickering was the director of the Harvard College Observatory and pioneered the classification of stellar spectra.
definitions.example_cn: 爱德华·查尔斯·皮克林是哈佛大学天文台的台长，开创了恒星光谱分类的先河。

definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun referring to several places in North America, including Pickering, Ontario, Canada, and Pickering, New Hampshire, USA.
definitions.explanation_cn: 专有名词，指北美多个地点，包括加拿大安大略省的皮克林和美国新罕布什尔州的皮克林。
definitions.example_en: Pickering, Ontario, is a suburban city located east of Toronto along Lake Ontario.
definitions.example_cn: 加拿大安大略省的皮克林是位于多伦多以东、安大略湖沿岸的一个郊区城市。

comparison.analysis: 作为专有名词，'Pickering' 与其他常见名词不同，它不具备普通词汇的语义范畴，不能作为通用名词使用。它仅用于指代特定人物或地点，因此无法与 'example'、'develop' 等普通动词或名词进行语义比较。其唯一性在于其历史与地理的专指性。
